data.prayer: Over 89.82 percent of the people of Kiên Giang are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kiên Giang, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 35,342 believers in Kiên Giang to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kiên Giang, Vietnam.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Kiên Giang, Vietnam by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Kiên Giang, Vietnam the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Cham, Eastern people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Cham, Eastern people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Cham, Eastern people is yours.
Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 35,342 believers living in the state of Kiên Giang. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Kiên Giang, Vietnam.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Kiên Giang, Vietnam need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
